amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to lease United States Navy Museum facilities at Washington Naval Yard, District of Columbia, to the Naval Historical Foundation.

action.text: Amendment SA 1563, previously agreed to, was modified further by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1563 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1563 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to lease United States Navy Museum facilities at Washington Naval Yard, District of Columbia, to the Naval Historical Foundation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1563 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1563 proposed by Senator Warner.
